ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: I had bought a Pugius for 20pp, and a week later, sold it for 40pp (Smile). So, I would recommend between 20 and 40! (smile!!) Tallonn - 35th Verse Bertox ...
ygData.messageBody:
I had bought a Pugius for 20pp, and a week later, sold it for 40pp (Smile).

So, I would recommend between 20 and 40! (smile!!)

Tallonn - 35th Verse
Bertox


-----Original Message-----
From: john doe <ruldaas@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 12:44 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How to know if Anthem is really working


>From: "john doe" <ruldaas@...>
>
>Once you start dual wielding you will notice stamina begin to play a role
in
>your longer battles. Lighter weapons mean less stamina loss. Remember you
>can always switch weapons mid battle...so If I were you I'd probably dual
>wield the PGT and the whip with the dirk in the ranged weapon slot. If the
>battle starts to get long and your stamina is dropping...then swith the
>tomohawk for the dirk.
>
>Anyone know the going rate of the Pugius dagger? I payed 25pp for one the
>other night...curious to know if I got a good deal (not that money is a
>problem after level 17).
>
>Ruldaas
>The Rathe
>
>
>>From: "Elena Glenn" <braveheart@...>
>>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Subject: Re: [eqbards] How to know if Anthem is really working
>>Date: Tue, 20 Jul 1999 11:34:47 -0700
>>
>>From: "Elena Glenn" <braveheart@...>
>>
>>How would a combination of a tentacle whip and a Polished Granite Tomahawk
>>be? I have both, and was planning on using them at level 17 for dual
>>wield.
>>Which shoud be the primary weapon, or is there a better combo? I also
have
>>a Dragoon Dirk. Any comments would be appreciated. Thanks
>>
>>Kirree
>>Xegony Server
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: TommyC <uber_sorcerer@...>
>>To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 11:03 AM
>>Subject: Re: [eqbards] How to know if Anthem is really working

>>
>> >From: "TommyC" <uber_sorcerer@...>
>> >
>> >I may be beating a dead horse,but.......I have been useing a mino axe
for
>> >the last 3 levels,singing a mix of Warsong and Anthem and hitting about
>> >every 4.5 to 5 seconds. Then last nite i was given a Tenticle whip by a
>> >guildmate and WOW !!!!! I was hitting about every 2 sec. in fighting a
>>Giant
>> >spider I was getting 3 to 4 swings to every 1 of the spiders. I must
say
>> >that if ye have the means(17pp) pick one up. It is a great starting
>>weapon
>> >for early teen bards!
>> >Thanks for a great list keep up the good work all :-)
>> >Pinen
>> >Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
>> >Master Brewer of the NwN
>> >Bard of the 11th Song
